quotes.text: You have the power to heal your life, and you need to know that.
They don't know that we know they know we know.
Don't it make you sad to know that life is more than who you are?
Leave something for someone but don't leave someone for something.
The people with ideas have no power and the people with power have no ideas.
You must take life the way it comes at you and make the best of it.
If you don't know what you want, how are you going to know when you get it?
quotes.source: Unlimited Memory: How to Use Advanced Learning Strategies to Learn Faster, Remember More and Be More Productive

quotes.text: If you have to ask, you will never know. If you know, you need only ask.
quotes.source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quotes.text: Your memory is the glue that binds your life together.
quotes.source: Unlimited Memory: How to Use Advanced Learning Strategies to Learn Faster, Remember More and Be More Productive

quotes.text: I'm sure there are things you know that you don't even know you know.
Perhaps if you know you are insane then you are not insane.
quotes.source: The Man in the High Castle

quotes.text: You can't use the fire exit because you're not made of fire.
The person that has the most to do with what happens to you is you!
quotes.source: Unlimited Memory: How to Use Advanced Learning Strategies to Learn Faster, Remember More and Be More Productive

quotes.text: There are darknesses in life and there are lights, and you are one of the lights, the light of all lights.
Sometimes the world as you know it just decides to become something else.
If you only do what you can do, you will never be more than who you are now.
If I have to hear one more time that you did this for the family...
And in the end, the love you take is equal to the love you make.
I've always loved you, and when you love someone, you love the whole person, just as he or she is, and not as you would like them to be.
Memory is a way of holding onto the things you love, the things you are, the things you never want to lose.
quotes.source: Unlimited Memory: How to Use Advanced Learning Strategies to Learn Faster, Remember More and be More Productive

quotes.text: You should never, never doubt something that no one is sure of.
Make sure you marry someone who laughs at the same things you do.
If you think that you are going to love something, give it a try.
quotes.source: What it Takes to Make More Money than Your Parents
